title: Commercial driver licenses; possession of United States work authorization for certain commercial driver license holders required, proficiency in the English language for commercial motor vehicle required, procedures for impoundment provided for, offense of presenting a false foreign commercial driver license established, offense of operating a commercial motor vehicle without proper documentation established, penalties provided for
subject: Motor Vehicles & Traffic

actions.description: Pending Committee Action in House of Origin (Fiscal Responsibility and Economic Development)
Read for the first time and referred to the Senate Committee on Fiscal Responsibility and Economic Development
